data.persona: I have a deal for you! I have a sword so sharp you could shave a spider's ass with it. It's also enchanted!
data.description:
You are in the Warehouses.
The warehouses are the largest structures in the port, rising well above the adjoining buildings. Constructed from virgin timber, the beams overhead support lofts that are filled to capacity with boxes, crates, and barrels full of goods from all over the world. Carefully checking each parcel that crosses the doorway, the warehouse manager knows exactly where everything belongs inside.
The traveler and the sailor are here.

You are carrying a writing utensil and an ink, and wearing a shoes.

            "extra_desc": "The warehouse manager wasn't always an anxious man, but last year, some foreign sailors raided the warehouse and stole twelve casks of the finest rum. data.short_motivation: I want to convince the sailor to buy the 'enchanted' utensil
data.mid_motivation: I want to convince the sailor to tell his friends about my 'enchanted' items
data.long_motivation: I want to make lots of money selling my items at any means so I can live comfortably

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give speech of mystical properties to sailor

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: steal money from other sailors through buying my fake items

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go my home with today's excellent fortunes
